languages.text: {n}Друкари заглядывает вам в глаза.{/n} "Те остатки Опустошительной бури, что мы встретили в пустоте... ты мог{mf||ла} бы отказать мне в том, о чем я просил. Мог{mf||ла} бы распорядиться этой добычей по своему. Но все же ты снизош{mf|ел|ла} к моей просьбе... и потому я должен отблагодарить тебя — так, могу только я".

{n}He looks into your eyes.{/n} "The vestiges of the Reaving Tempest that we encountered in the void... You could have refused my request. You could have disposed of those spoils however you wished, but you deigned to indulge me... and so I must express my thanks — as only I can."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари заглядывает вам в глаза.{/n} "Те остатки Опустошительной бури, что мы встретили в пустоте... ты мог{mf||ла} бы отказать мне в том, о чем я просил. Мог{mf||ла} бы распорядиться этой добычей по своему. Но все же ты снизош{mf|ел|ла} к моей просьбе... и потому я должен отблагодарить тебя — так, могу только я".

traits.locale_text: {n}He looks into your eyes.{/n} "The vestiges of the Reaving Tempest that we encountered in the void... You could have refused my request. You could have disposed of those spoils however you wished, but you deigned to indulge me... and so I must express my thanks — as only I can."

{n}He looks into your eyes.{/n} "The vestiges of the Reaving Tempest that we encountered in the void... You could have refused my request. You could have disposed of those spoils however you wished, but you deigned to indulge me... and so I must express my thanks — as only I can."

{n}He looks into your eyes.{/n} "The vestiges of the Reaving Tempest that we encountered in the void... You could have refused my request. You could have disposed of those spoils however you wished, but you deigned to indulge me... and so I must express my thanks — as only I can."

{n}He looks into your eyes.{/n} "The vestiges of the Reaving Tempest that we encountered in the void... You could have refused my request. You could have disposed of those spoils however you wished, but you deigned to indulge me... and so I must express my thanks — as only I can."

languages.text: {n}他凝视着你的双眼。{/n}“我们在虚空之中遇到了狂风阴谋团的残党……你当时本可以拒绝我的请求，随你所欲地处理那些战利品，可你却屈尊纡贵地答应了我的请求……因此，我必须表达我的谢意，尽我所能。”
languages.original_text: {n}He looks into your eyes.{/n} "The vestiges of the Reaving Tempest that we encountered in the void... You could have refused my request. You could have disposed of those spoils however you wished, but you deigned to indulge me... and so I must express my thanks — as only I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}他凝视着你的双眼。{/n}“我们在虚空之中遇到了狂风阴谋团的残党……你当时本可以拒绝我的请求，随你所欲地处理那些战利品，可你却屈尊纡贵地答应了我的请求……因此，我必须表达我的谢意，尽我所能。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイが目を見つめてくる。{/n}「虚空の中で遭遇した略奪の嵐の名残…お前は俺の頼みを断ることもできた。お前次第でアレを処分することもできたのに、お前はあえて俺の頼みを聞いてくれた…だから感謝の気持ちを示そう―俺にしか出来ない方法で」
languages.original_text: {n}He looks into your eyes.{/n} "The vestiges of the Reaving Tempest that we encountered in the void... You could have refused my request. You could have disposed of those spoils however you wished, but you deigned to indulge me... and so I must express my thanks — as only I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイが目を見つめてくる。{/n}「虚空の中で遭遇した略奪の嵐の名残…お前は俺の頼みを断ることもできた。お前次第でアレを処分することもできたのに、お前はあえて俺の頼みを聞いてくれた…だから感謝の気持ちを示そう―俺にしか出来ない方法で」

languages.text: {n}El drukhari te mira a los ojos.{/n} «Los vestigios de la Tempestad Asoladora que encontramos en el vacío... Pudiste rechazar mi petición. Pudiste deshacerte de esos despojos como te viniese en gana, pero te dignaste a complacerme... y ahora debo expresarte mi agradecimiento del único modo que conozco».
languages.original_text: {n}He looks into your eyes.{/n} "The vestiges of the Reaving Tempest that we encountered in the void... You could have refused my request. You could have disposed of those spoils however you wished, but you deigned to indulge me... and so I must express my thanks — as only I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}El drukhari te mira a los ojos.{/n} «Los vestigios de la Tempestad Asoladora que encontramos en el vacío... Pudiste rechazar mi petición. Pudiste deshacerte de esos despojos como te viniese en gana, pero te dignaste a complacerme... y ahora debo expresarte mi agradecimiento del único modo que conozco».

languages.text: {n}Il vous regarde droit dans les yeux.{/n} « Les vestiges de la Tempête ravageuse que nous avons rencontrés dans le vide... Vous auriez très bien pu rejeter ma demande et disposer de ce butin à votre guise, mais vous avez accédé à mon bon plaisir et je vous dois des remerciements... des remerciements tels que moi seul suis en mesure d'en offrir. »
languages.original_text: {n}He looks into your eyes.{/n} "The vestiges of the Reaving Tempest that we encountered in the void... You could have refused my request. You could have disposed of those spoils however you wished, but you deigned to indulge me... and so I must express my thanks — as only I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il vous regarde droit dans les yeux.{/n} « Les vestiges de la Tempête ravageuse que nous avons rencontrés dans le vide... Vous auriez très bien pu rejeter ma demande et disposer de ce butin à votre guise, mais vous avez accédé à mon bon plaisir et je vous dois des remerciements... des remerciements tels que moi seul suis en mesure d'en offrir. »

languages.text: {n}Er schaut dir in die Augen.{/n}"Die Überreste des plündernden Sturms, auf die wir in der Leere gestoßen sind ... Ihr hättet meine Bitte auch ablehnen können. Ihr hättet mit der Beute alles machen können, was Ihr wollt, aber Ihr wart so gnädig, mich zu verwöhnen ... und deshalb muss ich Euch meinen Dank aussprechen – so wie nur ich es vermag."
languages.original_text: {n}He looks into your eyes.{/n} "The vestiges of the Reaving Tempest that we encountered in the void... You could have refused my request. You could have disposed of those spoils however you wished, but you deigned to indulge me... and so I must express my thanks — as only I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er schaut dir in die Augen.{/n}"Die Überreste des plündernden Sturms, auf die wir in der Leere gestoßen sind ... Ihr hättet meine Bitte auch ablehnen können. Ihr hättet mit der Beute alles machen können, was Ihr wollt, aber Ihr wart so gnädig, mich zu verwöhnen ... und deshalb muss ich Euch meinen Dank aussprechen – so wie nur ich es vermag."

languages.text: {n}Gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n} "Uçsuzda karşılaştığımız Müfteris Kasırga kalıntıları... Talebimi geri çevirebilirdin. O ganimetlerden dilediğin şekilde kurtulabilirdin ancak bana hoşgörü lütfettin. Ben de bu nedenle müteşekkirliğimi ifade etme gereği duydum. Elimden gelen bu."
languages.original_text: {n}He looks into your eyes.{/n} "The vestiges of the Reaving Tempest that we encountered in the void... You could have refused my request. You could have disposed of those spoils however you wished, but you deigned to indulge me... and so I must express my thanks — as only I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gözlerinin içine bakıyor.{/n} "Uçsuzda karşılaştığımız Müfteris Kasırga kalıntıları... Talebimi geri çevirebilirdin. O ganimetlerden dilediğin şekilde kurtulabilirdin ancak bana hoşgörü lütfettin. Ben de bu nedenle müteşekkirliğimi ifade etme gereği duydum. Elimden gelen bu."
